name: Logic puzzle: Slitherlink
description:
Example of how to create a logic game with figma using the new beta interactions - all it needs is one component.


I'd love to collaborate with someone who can add a script to this file to adapt more game authenticity - i.e. a logic check, automatic filling of crosses and the possibility to add a win screen once the riddle is solved correctly.
